text.Maya: Thanks! Looks like you bailed me out of another jam.

text.Phoenix: Well... you know...

text.Maya: But... I really don't want something like this to happen ever again.
I'm fine because I have you to help me out, Nick... But every time something happens, I lose someone special to me. First my sister... And now my aunt...
Hey, Nick... Tell me... Tell me why my aunt went and did something so horrible? Why would she help Ms. Mimi with a plan like that...!? I just... I just don't understand it, Nick...

text.Phoenix: Maya, it's over. Why don't we just let it be.

text.Maya: Nick, please, I need an answer...

text.Phoenix: ( The reason Morgan helped Mimi with her plan was... )

CHOICE.ACTION: USER SELECTS Present Pearl Fey profile

CHOICE.Maya: ... Pearly?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Four years from now, a new Master will be "born" into Kurain Village. And that person will be you, Maya.

CHOICE.Maya: A-And...?

CHOICE.Phoenix: But, if you weren't there... then the main family's bloodline would disappear... And what would happen then...?

CHOICE.Maya: ... ...The branch family... My aunt...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ...No, Morgan's spiritual power is too weak. The next person would be... Pearls.

CHOICE.Maya: ...Aaaah!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Everything was done for her sake. It was all so that Pearls would become the next Master.

CHOICE.Maya: Y-Yeah... I can see that... ...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( ...? Did Maya say something just now...? I think that she was saying... " I thought so "... )

CHOICE.ACTION:
Leads to "Date and time unknown 
Detention Center 
Solitary Confinement Cell 13"

CHOICE.Maya: ...? I don't get it.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Yeah, me neither. Even I don't really know why Morgan cooperated with Mimi Miney...
Look, this whole thing is over now, so let's not dwell on the past, OK?

CHOICE.Maya: Yeah... Thanks, Nick.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I just don't know the answer to this one... I'm just as confused about the situation as she is... So why the " thanks "? )

CHOICE.ACTION:
Leads to "Date and time unknown 
Detention Center 
Solitary Confinement Cell 13"

text.ACTION: Date and time unknown Detention Center Solitary Confinement Cell 13

text.LOCATION: Episode 2: Reunion, and Turnabout THE END

text.ACTION: December 26, 8:12 PM Berry Big Circus Circus Entrance

text.Pearl: Wow... That was like being in a dream... I haven't even caught my breath yet.
text._info: (Changed from [Wow... That was like living a dream...] in the original release)

text.Maya: Hehe... That was amazing! Wasn't it Pearly!?

text.Pearl: It was great! There was a dancing bear... And a tiger that jumped through a ring of fire... An elephant that rode a giant ball... Not to mention that guy who flew through the air!
text._info: (Changed from [And a tiger that jumped though [sic] a ring of fire... An elephant who rode a giant ball...] in the original release)

text.Maya: Yeah! Max Galactica! He was absolutely fabulous!

text.Pearl: Huh? ...What? Max...

text.Maya: Max Galactica! The World's Greatest Magician!

text.Pearl: A magic-ician?

text.Maya: No, a magician.

text.Pearl: Umm... Mr. Nick.

text.Phoenix: Huh? What is it, Pearls?

text.Pearl: Does magic have anything to do with channeling spirits?

text.Phoenix: ( I don't think it has anything to do with channeling... ) You don't know about magic, do you Pearls?

text.Pearl: I'm sorry...

text.Phoenix: ( I braved the winter cold and took Pearls to see the circus. It's been six months since the incident in Kurain Village... and it was during that trying time that I met Pearls... Thankfully, she seems to be recovering from it, and is returning to her normal self. ( Changed from [It seems like she is starting to get back to normal...] in the original release ) )
text._info: (Changed from [It was during that terrible time that I met Pearls...] in the original release)

text.Maya: Ahh... It's time to go.

text.Pearl: You're right. We can't miss the last train.

text.Phoenix: Pearls! You remembered the train!

text.Pearl: Of course I did! But I don't really understand what everyone means by "express train".

text.Maya: Well, Nick... See you later. I'll come by to help clean the office. It's gotta be spotless for the new year.

text.Phoenix: Don't worry about it. Really.

text.Pearl: You are going to visit Mr. Nick on New Year's?

text.Maya: Maybe.

text.Pearl: I am glad you will get to spend your New Year's with your special someone!

text.Maya: P-PEARLY!! Look! It's time to go!

text.Pearl: Happy New Year, Mr. Nick!

text.Phoenix: ( "Happy New Year"... I really hope it will turn out that way... )

text.ACTION: December 28, 9:12 AM Wright & Co. Law Offices

text.Phoenix: ( Well... Today wraps it up for this year... I hope I can finish cleaning this place up in one day. )
...Hello. This is the Wright & Co. Law Offices.

text.Maya: Nick!! It's t-t-terrible!!

text.Phoenix: Ahh, Maya. Perfect timing... Things are terrible here too!

text.Maya: Huh?

text.Phoenix: The office is a terrible mess! And I have to clean it up!

text.Maya: What are you talking about!?

text.Phoenix: Ummm... My dirty office. What are you talking about?

text.Maya: Listen Nick! You have to turn on the TV!

text.Phoenix: ( The TV? )

text.TV: ...Now let's check in at the scene!

text.Phoenix: ( Huh? What happened...? )

text.TV: ...Thank you. We're here at the Berry Big Circus. The Berry Big Circus has become the center of a sensational murder . The scene has created quite a stir among the throngs of excited onlookers!

text.Phoenix: The Very... I mean... The Berry Big Circus...

text.Maya: That's the circus we went to!! Right!?

text.Phoenix: They're saying that there was a... murder.

text.Maya: Yeah! They arrested him too!

text.Phoenix: A-Arrested who?

text.Maya: Max! They arrested Max Galactica!!

text.Phoenix: ( Maximillion Galactica. Fans call him Max. A popular magician who can fly through the sky at will... Maya said she was a huge fan of Max... )

text.Maya: Alright Nick! I'll see you in two hours at the Detention Center.

text.Phoenix: Huh? What?

text.Maya: See you there. You've still got plenty of time to clean up your office later!

text.Phoenix: W-WWWHHHAATTT!?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Difficult-looking legal books stand in a formidable row. They mock me. I wouldn't mind dumping some of these off at the used bookstore... But that might not be such a good idea.
Charley. A quite decorative plant. I wouldn't mind his help cleaning this place up.
My desk. Since I don't have time to sit, it's unusually clean...

A poster of the newest member of the "Steel Samurai" universe. Maya went out and bought it right away. She's a sucker for all things Steel Samurai. I hear they're even giving the new guy his own movie. I just know Maya is going to drag me out to see it with her...
There is a giant building just outside the window. It's the Gatewater Hotel, a high-class, luxury hotel. Until recently, it had been a normal, business-class hotel.

text.ACTION: December 28, 11:19 AM Detention Center Visitor's Room

text.Maya: What are they talking about? Why did they arrest Max?

text.Phoenix: You're asking the wrong man on that one, Maya. Maybe he used his magical skills to deal death with a slight [sic] of hand...

text.Maya: Maximillion Galactica would never do such a thing!!

text.???: FABULOUS!! What the young lady just said was absolutely fabulous! What a clever girl! Such a fabulous understanding of events!

text.Phoenix: ( ...What's with all this fabulous talk... )

text.Max: Welcome to the Visitor's Room!

text.Maya: It's MAX!! Nick!! Look! It's the real Maximillion Galactica!!

text.Max: Alright sweetie. Pick a card, any card.

text.Maya: H-H-He called me sweetie! * swoon * Nick!!

text.Max: Ah ha ha ha... Time's running out sweetie! Pick a card, any card!

text.Maya: T-This one...

text.Max: Uh-huh. I thought you would pick that one sweetie. The ace of hearts!

text.Maya: AHHHH!!! He got it! He got it! NICK! LOOK! HE GOT IT!!

text.Max: What can I say sweetie... You've stolen one of my most valued possessions. One of Maximillion Galactica's hearts...

text.Maya: Max... * swoon *

text.Max: Well... Time to make this an absolutely fabulous time!

text.Maya: Max! You should let Nick pick a card!!

text.Phoenix: ( Eek... I don't want to steal one of his hearts... )

text.Max: And you are...? Oh, how silly of me! You must be sweetie's driver!

text.Phoenix: Her driver?

text.Max: Whatever... Hurry up and pick a card, any card...

text.Phoenix: Umm... I want this one.

text.Max: So sweetie, let's be honest here... You came to this visitor's room to visit me, didn't you?

text.Maya: Y-Yes! I'm your biggest fan!!

text.Max: Fabulous! Absolutely fabulous! Thank you so much!!

text.Phoenix: Hey... Umm... What about my card?

text.Max: Think of it as a souvenir.

text.Maya: Well Nick... I think it's time to get to work.
What's the matter, Nick? Why are you looking at the ceiling?

text.Phoenix: I was just thinking about what I should have for lunch.

text.Max: Sweetie... Drop porcupine head over there. Shower me with your attention. OK?

text.Maya: O-O-O-Oh, yes...!
text._info: (Changed from [Y-Y-Y-Yes...] in the original release)

text.Max: Ab-so-lute-ly... FABULOUS!!

text.Phoenix: ( Absolutely cringe inducing. )

CHOICE.Phoenix: Smile, you're on candid camera. Max keeps sneaking glances up at the security camera on the wall... I wonder if he is still trying to be a star?

This guard monitors the visitor's room. He's so quiet, you could forget he was even there... If he wasn't watching everything. He's pushed up against the wall... Kinda like a magnet on a refrigerator.

CHOICE.Maya: Max, I was hoping you could tell me a little bit more about yourself...

CHOICE.Max: FABULOUS! I think we should get to know each other better, too! Why don't you come sit next to me?

CHOICE.Maya: Umm... There's a big piece of security glass between us...

CHOICE.Max: Oh sweet geebus! What in the world!? If only I could use magic! Then I could make this wall disappear...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( What is this guy talking about!? ) Anyways... Lately, you've become awfully famous, haven't you Max?

CHOICE.Max: That's Maximillion to you, porcupine head! Get it straight!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Jeez, people nowadays... They get their panties all in a bunch over nothing! ) Anyway, Maximillion, you won a very prestigious award recently, did you not?

CHOICE.Max: I did indeed! It was FABULOUS! I won the Magician's Grand Prix, held by the Association of International Magicians. It's an award that recognizes that I am the most fabulouso of fabulous world magicians. There was a trophy, and a bust. It was a fab... I mean it was an amazing day.

CHOICE.Maya: Wow! That's incredible!

CHOICE.Max: Isn't it!? I'm certainly the greatest magician in the world!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I'm going to guess he didn't win a trophy for most modest magician. )

CHOICE.Maya: You are signed to an exclusive contract with the Berry Big Circus, correct?

CHOICE.Max: That's the long and short of it. You sure do your research sweetie! I'm impressed. You just can't watch a magician on TV, you know!? Magic is so fabulous, you have to see it with your own eyes, sweetie!

CHOICE.Maya: You're right! You're so right!

CHOICE.Max: However, the circus... It's a dinosaur. A thing of the past. Nowadays, no one even cares about what goes on there.

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? What do you mean?

CHOICE.Max: That's why I signed the contract!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's why you signed the contract?

CHOICE.Max: Thanks to me, the Berry Big Circus is fabulously popular! People come out in droves to catch a glimpse of the magic of Max Galactica! I revived the dinosaur that is the circus! But to me, it was just another magic trick! Isn't it just wonderful, sweetie?

CHOICE.Maya: Y-Yes...

CHOICE.Max: I made all the old crusty performances obsolete!

CHOICE.Maya: But I kinda like the circus performances...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Maya looks a bit down... )
Tell me what happened at the Berry Big Circus.

CHOICE.Max: Ahh... Last night. The Ringmaster was murdered.

CHOICE.Maya: The Ringmaster... You mean Russell Berry?

CHOICE.Max: Someone smashed him over the head, I hear. He was slumped over on the ground. Even though it was the middle of the night, the police presence was fabulous. The police questioned me at length...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Questioned you about what?

CHOICE.Max: About everything... I was the last one to see the Ringmaster before he was murdered. I saw him last evening... In his room.
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [I saw him that night... In his room.] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: So then why were you arrested?

CHOICE.Max: Arrested? Don't make an ant hill into a mountain, sweetie. They just wanted to consult with me on matters... That's all.

CHOICE.Maya: Nick... I don't think Max understands how serious this is.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( She's right... I think I should shock him back to reality... )
Before the murder, you met with the Ringmaster?

CHOICE.Max: Uh-huh.

CHOICE.Phoenix: What did you talk about?

CHOICE.Max: Things that aren't for your ears.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Maya. Would you please ask him?

CHOICE.Maya: What did you talk about with the Ringmaster, Max?

CHOICE.Max: It was nothing... Small talk really... We were just having a chat about my salary.

CHOICE.Maya: Salary?

CHOICE.Max: I am the one bringing in the crowds. I think that I should be compensated as such. You agree, don't you?
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [I am the one bringing in all of the crowds to the circus.] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: Y-Yes...

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's all you talked about?

CHOICE.Max: Of course! It was a fabulous chat!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Just fabulous! I mean-- Argh! Now he's got ME saying it! )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [Fabulous! Why does he have to keep saying fabulous!?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: What's the matter, Nick? You look all bent out of shape.

CHOICE.Max: When you make absolutely fabulous magic... It costs enormous sums of money. Sums that will boggle your mind!

CHOICE.Maya: That's why you went to his room that night...?

CHOICE.Max: I went to ask him for a fabulous raise.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I wonder how people can lie with such a straight face... )

CHOICE.Max: What is that badge? Is it used in a disappearing act?

CHOICE.Phoenix: I'm not a magician, Max. I'm an attorney.

CHOICE.Max: An attorney? Then why are you wasting your time talking to me?

CHOICE.Maya: He isn't wasting his time! Max... You're...

CHOICE.Max: OK! OK! Relax, sweetie... You're just a little overanxious, I think...

CHOICE.Maya: * whimper *

CHOICE.Max: So, would you like to come up on stage with me sometime?

CHOICE.Maya: Re-Really? Is that really OK?

CHOICE.Max: I'll bring you up on stage as a volunteer from the audience!

CHOICE.Maya: REALLY!?

CHOICE.Max: I'll give you something before the show, and then on stage you'll sneak it to me...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Wait a second... He's planting her in the audience to rig a magic trick! )
Do you mind taking a look at this?

CHOICE.Max: I guess I have no choice... But really, is this the proper time or place for this?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( He signed his own photo... )

CHOICE.Maya: Nick... You mind giving that to me when the case is over?

CHOICE.Phoenix: What about this?

CHOICE.Max: Fabulous!! You'd like me to sign this for you?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( * sigh * )

text.ACTION: After clearing all Talk options and presenting Attorney's Badge:

text.Max: ... Anyways... I've been curious about something for a while now.

text.Maya: What's that?

text.Max: Why do you keep looking at me with such a sad look on your face, sweetie?

text.Maya: Be-Because! You've been arrested! For murder!

text.Max: Oh, don't be ignorant. They wouldn't arrest someone like me!!

text.Phoenix: Why is that?

text.Max: Obviously because I'm the fabulous Maximillion Galactica!

text.Phoenix: So?

text.Max: I'm the very big star of the Berry Big Circus.

text.Phoenix: And that means?

text.Max: I'm rich. I'm paid fabulous sums!

text.Phoenix: Which means what?

text.Maya: Max...

text.Max: Quit joking around! You've got to be pulling my magic wand! The police aren't really serious about all this, are they?

text.Phoenix: They don't arrest people as a joke.

text.Maya: Look at Max... He's crushed...

text.Phoenix: Well he needed to wake up and smell the coffee. ( This is serious business. )

text.Max: Umm... Umm...

text.Phoenix: Yes?

text.Max: Porcu... I mean, Sir. You're a lawyer, right?

text.Phoenix: Huh? Oh, yeah. I'm an attorney.

text.Max: Please! Help me! I didn't kill nobody!

text.Maya: "Didn't kill nobody!?"

text.Max: I may be more spoiled than a hog in a hamburger mud pit... But a killer!? That's insane... I... I... I could never...

text.Maya: M-Max?

text.Max: I swear!! I just wanted to pay off my daddy's debt... He's back on the farm...

text.Phoenix: OK... OK... I'll take your case.

text.Max: R-Really?

text.Phoenix: Really.

text.Max: Uh... Thank ya much. Ya'll sure are nice folks.

text.Maya: Umm... Max.

text.Max: Yes?

text.Maya: What's your real name?

text.Max: It's Billy Bob Johns...

text._info: (Changed from [... Ugh...] in the original release)

text.Phoenix: What's the matter, Maya?

text.Maya: He's really just a country bumpkin!

text.Max: ...Ahem. I must apologize for not being my absolutely fabulous self just now, sweetie.

text.Maya: H-Huh?

text.Max: Mr. Attorney.

text.Phoenix: Yes?

text.Max: A few minutes ago, you took one of my cards, didn't you?

text.Phoenix: ( Hmm... Now that he mentions it... I did take a card. )

text.Max: It was the 10 of Hearts. Right?

text.Phoenix: ( Wha... How'd he... He got it right, again! )

text.Max: What can I say? You, too... You've stolen some of my most valued possessions. Ten of Maximillion Galactica's hearts...

text.Phoenix: ( You sure do have a lot of hearts, don't you? )

text.Max: Ah ha ha ha... I'm putting my faith in you sweetie.

text.Phoenix: ( He didn't just call me sweetie, did he? )

text.Maya: Alright! Let's make this an absolutely fabulous case! C'mon, Nick!

text.Phoenix: Alright... We've got lots of things we have to look into. No time for slacking. Let's get going.

text.Maya: OK.

text.Phoenix: ? What's the matter? You seem down.

text.Maya: Maximilion Galactica... Who would have guessed he was country bumpkin?

CHOICE.Phoenix: So now what do we do?

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? There's still lots of things we can do! Go to the scene of the crime, talk to witnesses, gather evidence...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Yeah. I guess you're right.

CHOICE.Maya: We still don't even know what happened in the first place.
We don't have enough information to make a case yet.

CHOICE.Phoenix: I could have sworn I've heard that before.

CHOICE.Maya: Well, we never have enough information!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Just admit it, you don't have a clue what happened.

CHOICE.Maya: Well... Your badge is still shining. Barely.

CHOICE.Phoenix: It may be showing a bit of wear, but I try to take good care of this thing.

CHOICE.Maya: You sure do love to show that off, don't you Nick? Who knows how many times you have shown it to me?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( She's right... I whip it out at the drop of a hat. )

CHOICE.Maya: Once you start channeling spirits... They say you lose sight of who you actually are...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Hmm... Do you really believe that?

CHOICE.Maya: Not really. But... Just in case, I plan to write my autobiography.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Your autobiography...?
What's the matter? You've been acting strange for a while now.

CHOICE.Maya: Max... He's just some country bumpkin...

CHOICE.Phoenix: So? Why does that matter? He's still a famous magician right?

CHOICE.Maya: I guess. But his real name is... Billy Bob Johns.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Yikes! The poor guy's got three first names! I guess that is pretty odd. )

CHOICE.Maya: Oh well! If a big star can do it, then you should pretend to be exotic too, Nick!

CHOICE.Phoenix: "A big star..."?

CHOICE.Maya: Max Galactica is a pretty big name! Anyways, what do you think about Naruhodo A. Wrighto?

CHOICE.Phoenix: N-N-Na... * cough * Umm... What's the "A" stand for?

CHOICE.Maya: The "A" stands for "Attorney".

CHOICE.Phoenix: I'll think about it...
This is kinda pointless don't you think?

CHOICE.Maya: If it's that pointless, then you don't have to worry about showing it to me.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( When she's right... She's right. )

text.ACTION: December 28 Berry Big Circus Circus Entrance

text.Maya: We're here again...

text.Phoenix: Yep. But this time we are here for work. ( It hasn't been that long since the crime, so the police are still on the scene. )

text.Maya: Let's find someone who might know something about what happened.

text.Phoenix: Sounds like a plan.

CHOICE.Maya: The Berry Big Top is so... Very... B... * cough * Enormous...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Yep. One look at the huge tent looming over you and you realize "This is the circus!"

CHOICE.Maya: I know! I know! It really gets your blood pumping doesn't it!?
Look! Look! It's Max!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Even when you don't want to see him... * poof * He's right in front of you. ( Sure the sign says "Berry Big Circus"... But looking around... It might as well be Cirque du Galactica... )

CHOICE.Maya: The stars on his cheek sure are dreamy... How about I draw a star on your cheek Nick? I've got a marker!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Nah! Nah! It's alright!
Those streamers do a nice job introducing the circus performers.

CHOICE.Maya: "Maximillion Galactica and his comical comrades!"

CHOICE.Phoenix: You know... You don't really see too many streamers nowadays, do you?

CHOICE.Maya: You're right. I haven't seen one in ages. I bet they stopped using them due to little kids climbing up to the top...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Umm... I don't think that was why... )
It's a snack stand. They have hot dogs, hamburgers, and drinks... Not to mention...

CHOICE.Maya: Candy and popcorn... They've even got snow cones!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Who would eat snow cones in the middle of winter? )

CHOICE.Maya: Nick... Do you think we can buy some snow cones?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Look around... There's tons of snow piled up all around here!

CHOICE.Maya: YAY!! Wait a second... There's no syrup though! I want syrup!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Hopefully she doesn't notice that discolored snow in the corner. That's not syrup! )

CHOICE.Maya: Nick... The entrance is right here.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Maya. The circus is closed today. No clowns. No elephants. No shows.

CHOICE.Maya: I know that! Nick... You can get your picture taken with Dali the elephant!

CHOICE.Phoenix: There's no Dali. Not today.

CHOICE.Maya: I know that too! Oh well... I'll just have to take a picture with whoever I stumble across...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( * sigh * It's not like we're here on business or anything... )
This is the Box Office where they sell all the tickets for the circus.

CHOICE.Maya: They also sell programs. I forgot to buy one when we came to the circus last time.

CHOICE.Phoenix: So then why don't you buy one now?

CHOICE.Maya: Hmm... Sounds like a plan. Oh no... It looks like I forgot my wallet. ...

CHOICE.Phoenix: If you want me to buy it for you, just ask me already.

CHOICE.Maya: You know I'd never do that to you, Nick...
Hmm... This door must lead to the lodging house.

CHOICE.Phoenix: "No Entry To Unauthorized Personnel"

CHOICE.Maya: Do you really need to say "No Entry" if no one's actually entering? It's almost like a zen riddle, isn't it Nick?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I'm not even going to justify that question with a response... )

CHOICE.Maya: I bet all of the stars stay at that lodging house.

text.Phoenix: This seems to be a dorm where all the performers in the circus stay...

text.Maya: Really!? So we might run into that stoogey clown here, right? He's so kooky!
text._info: (Changed from [Really!? So that stoogey clown should be here, huh? He's so kooky!] in the original release)

text.???: Ahhh! It's you two!

text.Maya: Oh... Detective Gumshoe!

text.Gumshoe: How is it you guys always seem to know when I'm working a crime scene, pal?
text._info: (Changed from [I always see you hanging around when I'm working a crime scene, pal.] in the original release)

text.Maya: Because you're always working, Detective.
text._info: (Changed from [You always seem to be working so hard, Detective.] in the original release)

text.Gumshoe: Well, I'd rather not be always working, but with crime, you don't make your own hours. If I have to be at the circus anyway, I want to see the lion tamer and the tightrope. However, no matter where I go, the show is always the same... Dead body. Stage left.
text._info: (Changed from [I'd rather not be working hard, but with crime you don't make your own hours.] in the original release)

text.Maya: Nick! Nick! He complained!!

text.Phoenix: Heh heh... That's a rarity. Let's get back to business now, OK?

CHOICE.Phoenix: There's some evidence under the tarp over there...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Hey! Watch it, pal! The killer is behind that tarp!!

CHOICE.Maya: AHHHHH!!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Ho! Ho! Ho! Got ya! I was just kidding!

CHOICE.Maya: GRRR!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Ho! Ho! Ho! Ho! Ho!
This year, I finally won an air conditioner!

CHOICE.Maya: What!? You didn't have an air conditioner? Did you ride your triceratops to work too?

CHOICE.Phoenix: And what do you mean you "won" an air conditioner? You didn't buy it?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I can't afford one of those things!! But I got lucky and won it as a door prize at the Annual Police Christmas Party!

CHOICE.Maya: They really pay you peanuts don't they?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Peanuts? I don't even get paid enough for peanut butter, let alone peanuts!
The safety lights around the circus are kept on all night long. So, they should have been on at the time of the murder...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( So he's saying the murder took place in the light...? )

CHOICE.Gumshoe: How strange...

CHOICE.Maya: How strange indeed... Hmm...

CHOICE.Phoenix: This is the only place that the snow has been trounced upon.

CHOICE.Maya: The murderer was sloppy leaving all these prints all over!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: No no no no no... We're the ones who left the prints... An investigation can be a messy thing sometimes.

CHOICE.Maya: What!?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I also slipped and fell in that spot over there. The other detectives all got a good laugh when the prosecutor whipped me. Thank god there was all this snow around to bring down the swelling.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( It's great to know that the police aren't worried about preserving the evidence... )
Do you know who will be the prosecutor in court tomorrow?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Of course. It will be Ms. von Karma.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Uhhh... She isn't gonna hit me with her whip again, is she?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: What do you have to worry about? You only have to see her in court! When she shows up at the precinct, the sound of that whip never ends, pal.

CHOICE.Maya: Detective Gumshoe... I'm sure Ms. von Karma's really interesting and all, but... there's someone else I'd rather talk about. ( Chagned from [What about that guy? What is he up to?] in the original release )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [Detective Gumshoe... That's enough about Von Karma.] in the original release)

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Like who?
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [That guy?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: Like Mr. Edgeworth, of course! You know! Nick's true rival, Miles Edgeworth! ( Changed from [You know! The Edgeworth that's Nick's rival!] in the original release ) What in the world happened after I went back home!? ( Changed from [What in the world happened when I went back home!?] in the original release )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [What happened to Edgeworth?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Gumshoe: M-Mr. Edgeworth... You haven't heard what happened to him?

CHOICE.Maya: Nick won't tell me!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Well, to be honest... I'm not at liberty to tell you either. Let's just say he's not around anymore.

CHOICE.Maya: He's not around!?!? Nick! What does he mean Mr. Edgeworth isn't around!?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Exactly what he said. He's not around. Edgeworth is gone... Don't say his name again, OK?

CHOICE.Maya: N-Nick?

CHOICE.Phoenix: The Ringmaster of the circus was murdered, wasn't he?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Yep. Last night around 10 PM. He died outside in the cold. A pretty sad way to go out if you ask me, pal.

CHOICE.Maya: ... It was rather cold.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: This is the scene of the crime, pal. The body was found right over there. Right about where you are standing now.

CHOICE.Maya: AHHHHHHHHHHH!!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Ho! Ho! Ho! Surprised you, didn't I?

CHOICE.Maya: I'm not laughing!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Excuse me, but do you mind telling me what happened to the victim?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: He was killed by a blow to the noggin, pal.

CHOICE.Maya: Yeep!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: It's pretty clear cut as far as murders go. He was discovered quickly. But...

CHOICE.Phoenix: But?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: There's just one thing that doesn't quite fit .

CHOICE.Maya: Hah! There always seems to be something that doesn't quite fit!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: What was this one thing that just didn't quite fit? The thing you mentioned earlier.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Footprints, pal. Footprints.

CHOICE.Maya: Footprints?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Look at this picture of the crime scene...

CHOICE.Phoenix: What's this? This wooden box under the body?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: No clue, pal. Some forensics experts took it back and are examining it now.

CHOICE.Maya: And... And... What is so mysterious about the footprints?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Whoa. Calm down now. Take a good look at the footprints in this picture.

CHOICE.Phoenix: The victim's footprints are on the scene.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: That's right, pal. The problem is...

CHOICE.Maya: ...! The killer's footprints aren't there!!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Bingo. Where did the killer come from, and where did the killer run off to? Obviously, there is no way the killer committed this crime while flying.

CHOICE.Phoenix: A flying... culprit?
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [A flying... Criminal?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( That's when something just clicked in my head... )

CHOICE.Maya: T-There's no way! Flying is impossible!

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's right. Flying is impossible! Absolutely impossible! Haha...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: What's with the hollow laugh, pal?

CHOICE.Phoenix: I meant nothing by it, pal...
( Better stated, it means I don't want to talk about it. Maybe I can get some info about Max out of him... )

Umm... So about the eyewitness ...
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [Umm... How about any eyewitnesses...?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Ho! Ho! Ho! You know I'm not going to tell you that! That's the prosecution's trump card!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Hmm... Oh well...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: ... Oh! I just remembered!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: What?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I forgot to mention that you two are barred from entering that lodging house .

CHOICE.Maya: ...? Why is that?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Oh... No reason! Just something I remembered to tell you.

CHOICE.Maya: It must be because that's where the eyewitness is.
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [It must be because there's an eyewitness inside that Lodging House.] in the original release)

CHOICE.Phoenix: Let's check it out!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Don't you dare, pal!
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [Oh no you don't, pal!] in the original release)

CHOICE.Gumshoe: C'non. You've flashed that badge at me so many times it doesn't work anymore! Why don't you try wearing a different badge every now and again?

CHOICE.Maya: Well... I do have a Steel Samurai Badge with me. How about that one?

CHOICE.Phoenix: I'll only wear it if Detective Gumshoe carries a Steel Samurai Police Badge.

CHOICE.Maya: Then it's a deal! I hear that Detective Gumshoe has that very badge! ...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: What!? Don't look at me like that!! You're making me nervous!
Being a spirit medium is quite an accomplishment... And you're so young too! That's really something!!

CHOICE.Maya: Actually, I've been thinking of taking a break from channeling.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Really?

CHOICE.Maya: I don't want to have another incident like last time.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: It looks like Max is the most unpopular guy in the circus tent. You know what they say... A bad attitude follows you everywhere...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Hmm, he's a bit arrogant, but he didn't seem that bad. )

CHOICE.Maya: But just because someone has a bad attitude doesn't make them a criminal.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: It's not just his attitude... I've got proof, pal!

CHOICE.Maya: Huh?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: He left something at the scene of the crime! One of his magician's trademarks! An incredibly well-made silk hat.

CHOICE.Maya: Well it does have very classy decorative elements.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Max uses a cloak, silk hat, and white roses as his signature symbols.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ... Pretty mundane, aren't they?

CHOICE.Maya: Who cares if they are mundane!? At least they are easy to understand!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I must have hit a nerve... )

CHOICE.Gumshoe: That's what he said.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Who said?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: The eyewitness .

CHOICE.Maya: Eh!?

CHOICE.Phoenix: T-Tell us about the eyewitness!!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: ... I'm making a really strange tired looking face here...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I wish I was more lively... ... Right now, I'm just tired.

CHOICE.Maya: Well, there's not much you can do about that, so you just gotta keep on being tired!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: You're right!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Glad I stayed out of that one... )

CHOICE.Gumshoe: You're going down this time, pal!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Oh... Is that right?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: She's been practicing 100 cracks a day, pal.

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Yep. Cracks of the WHIP!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Uhhh...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: You know I can't tell you two anything about the evidence we have gathered!

CHOICE.Maya: Stingy!

CHOICE.Gumshoe: ... Stingy!? When you put it so bluntly, it kinda hurts my feelings, pal...

text.ACTION: After clearing "The eyewitness" Talk option in Lodging House - Plaza:
December 28 Lodging Hall 1st Floor Moe's Room

text.Phoenix: I wonder whose room this is.
text._info: (Changed from [This is it?] in the original release)

text.Maya: The nametag on the door says "Moe" on it.

text.Phoenix: I guess he's not here...

text.Maya: Wow... It's a real mess in here!

text.Phoenix: ( My room's probably worse though... )

text.Maya: Oh well... I give up. We'll have to come back later.

CHOICE.Phoenix: All those clown costumes lined up like that... I dunno about you, but it's creepy.

CHOICE.Maya: Look at the collection he's got! It's incredible!

CHOICE.Phoenix: It must be a collection of clown costumes from around the world.

CHOICE.Maya: Oh! I almost forgot!

CHOICE.Phoenix: What is it now? ( She better not want me to try one of those on! )

CHOICE.Maya: I was thinking of starting a costume collection myself! I'll call it "World Spirit Channels"... We can display it in our office!

CHOICE.Phoenix: In OUR office!? As soon as you start paying the bills, you can say that.
Look at the ceiling... It looks like someone punched a hole in it!

CHOICE.Maya: You're right. I wonder what happened?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Hmm... I don't even want to imagine what goes on in here. )

CHOICE.Maya: What the!? There's a string of carrots here!

CHOICE.Phoenix: How strange. The carrots seem to come in all different shapes... Weird... I can't tell if Moe just likes carrots, or if he is using them for some sort of gag.

CHOICE.Maya: Nick, you can see the scene of the crime from here.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( You can even tell that the ground has been disturbed... )

CHOICE.Maya: It's right in front of this window, about 30 feet away.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I guess it wouldn't have been strange for someone to have seen the crime from here. )
Moe's got an excellent pair of pajamas... Laid on his bed in an excellent manner.

CHOICE.Maya: What? Those are pajamas? You mean he goes to bed dressed as a clown? Eww...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Moe seems to be a voracious reader. Look at all the hard books he has here. "Clowns for Dummies", "The Joke's On You", "Treat Your Peons Right", And the classic "Funny Jokes Are Funny."

CHOICE.Maya: Wow. Moe is very studious.

CHOICE.Phoenix: "The Joke's On You"... Huh?

CHOICE.Maya: Tee hee... Clown equipment is so funny looking!

CHOICE.Phoenix: He's got a balancing ball, a unicycle... He's even got a trampoline!! ... But they're all broken.

CHOICE.Maya: Maybe he was just a little too excited during practice?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Who knows with that guy. Maybe that's part of the gag? )

CHOICE.Maya: Awesome! Look at these shoes! They're great!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Forget the shoes! Check out the great gag banana peel!

CHOICE.Maya: You sure it wasn't Moe's snack after lunch?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Are you blind? Look at how many scratches there are from people slipping on it!! )

text.ACTION: December 28 Berry Big Circus Big Top

text.Phoenix: The circus stage sure doesn't look this small from out in the audience...

text.Maya: Wow... This is where they all perform, isn't it? Nick! Do some somersaults!

text.Phoenix: I'm not doing any somersaults.

text.Maya: Why not!? You look like you'd be great at it!

text.Phoenix: ( Why do I look like I'd be great at somersaults!? )

text.???: Grrrrrrrrrrrrrr...

text.Maya: Huh? Nick?

text.Phoenix: It wasn't me.

text.???: Grrrrrrrrrrr... Grawwwwwww!!

text.Maya: T-T-T-T-T-T-T... TIGER!!

text.Phoenix: H-H-H-He's c-c-coming this way!!

text.???: Grrrrrrrrr... Grawwwwwww!!

text.Phoenix: AHHHHHHHHHHH!!

text.Maya: Nick! You're too young to die! NICK!!

text.???: STAY! STAY! HEEL!
Grrrrrrrrr...

text.Phoenix: ( I'm still here... I'm not dead, yet!! )

text.Maya: N-Nick! Nick! Are you OK?

text.???: Ahahaha! Scared ya didn't I? Regent is such a cute tiger! Isn't he!?
What's the matter? You two sure are quiet.

text.Maya: Don't "What's the matter?" me! N-Nick... He almost died there!!

text.???: Hah! He wasn't anywhere close to getting hurt, let alone dying! This little tiger hardly ever bites people. And besides, people normally never get to play with a wild tiger, right? So if you think about it, you're actually really lucky!

text.Phoenix: Huh!?

text.???: You agree, don't you?

text.Phoenix: ... I guess...

text.Maya: W-W-W-What do you mean you guess!? Why are you agreeing with her?

text.???: Woohoo!! Your costume...

text.Maya: Eh?

text.???: It's cute. I wanna try it on!!

text.Maya: C-Costume? You mean my clothes...?

text.???: You don't mind letting me try it on, right?

text.Maya: Uhh... I guess not...

text.???: REALLY!? Hehehehehe!! You're the best!

text.Phoenix: ( Wow... The tables turned quickly on that one. So much for the tiger thing... )

text.???: Oh! I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Regina Berry... The renowned animal tamer of the Berry Big Circus!

text.Maya: My name's Maya Fey. I'm a spirit medium.

text.Phoenix: Phoenix Wright. Attorney at law. ( When you put us up next to an animal tamer, I bet we really look odd! )

text.Regina: Nice to meet ya!

text.Phoenix: Uhh... Likewise...

CHOICE.Maya: The seats are kinda far away don't you think?

CHOICE.Phoenix: They are, but it also means that lots of people can fit in the big top.

CHOICE.Regina: He's right. We can fit 500 people into a show.

CHOICE.Maya: Five hundred... That's amazing.

CHOICE.Regina: Flying around above that many people is a "real rush". At least that's what Max said.

CHOICE.Maya: Ah, a ladder.

CHOICE.Phoenix: It's just a stepladder.

CHOICE.Maya: What's the difference? They do the same thing, right? I think you should stick with the basic facts of the matter.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Oh... Uh... OK. ( It's not even worth arguing with her on this one. )

CHOICE.Maya: Look! That's where Max comes out during the show!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: I've got to admit, that was a pretty cool effect!

CHOICE.Regina: We're planning for me to start coming out of the lion during the show.

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's great Regina!

CHOICE.Regina: Yeah. I will ride on Regent's back and jump out of the lion's mouth.

CHOICE.Maya: I wanna try it too! I'll ride on Nick's back and jump out of the lion's mouth!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Sometimes I wonder about this girl... )
There doesn't seem to be anything here that can help us... Not a single clue.

CHOICE.Maya: You know I've been meaning to ask you... What exactly do you mean when you say "clue"? What are you looking for?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ... A bloody chainsaw for instance...

CHOICE.Maya: Well there's definitely not one of those here...
Hey! It's a rope!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Probably for tightrope walking...

CHOICE.Maya: That's a bit strange... There weren't any tightrope walkers in the show when we saw it.
Whoa! Those lights are huge!

CHOICE.Regina: I love lights!! Whenever I appear under the spotlight, everyone claps for me!

CHOICE.Maya: That's because everyone knows that you're cute!

CHOICE.Regina: No... I'm not cute. You're cute!

CHOICE.Maya: Me!?

CHOICE.Regina: Of course! I'm sure you'd make an incredible heroine!

CHOICE.Maya: Really!? You think so!? Nick! Did you hear that!? Me!! A heroine!! What about Nick, Regina?

CHOICE.Regina: ... Hmm... Nick...

CHOICE.Maya: He's no hero, is he?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Ouch... Thanks a lot Maya! )

CHOICE.Maya: Hey Regina... What do you know about what happened last night?

CHOICE.Regina: You mean the murder...?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Uh huh.

CHOICE.Regina: My dad was murdered.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Oh, I see... ( Wait! What did she just say!? )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [I can't imagine how hard this must be for you... (Urk! That was insensitive!)] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: So... the Ringmaster was your...
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [That's right! The Ringmaster was your...] in the original release)

CHOICE.Regina: Yep. The Ringmaster was my dad.

CHOICE.Maya: I'm so sorry about what happened to him...

CHOICE.Regina: Why do you say you're sorry?

CHOICE.Maya: Huh?
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [Eh?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Regina: Anyways... Everyone was here practicing last night.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Even your dad?

CHOICE.Regina: Yes. Everyone was here. We finished up around 10 PM. After that, everyone went off on their own. I was the only one who stayed around here.

CHOICE.Maya: Why did you do that?

CHOICE.Regina: I was playing with Regent.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Regent... So she was with that beast... )

CHOICE.Regina: That's when the police showed up. When they took me to check things out, Dad was dead.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( For someone whose father was just murdered, she seems awfully perky... I wish she would tell us more about her dad ... )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from For someone who's [sic] father was just murdered, she seems awfully perky...] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: That's incredible that you are an animal tamer!

CHOICE.Regina: If you say so...

CHOICE.Maya: It has to be really scary!

CHOICE.Regina: Scary? Why?

CHOICE.Maya: Huh?

CHOICE.Regina: Regent isn't scary! He's cute! Ever since L√©on died, Regent has been my best friend.

CHOICE.Phoenix: L√©on?

CHOICE.Regina: Yes. L√©on the lion.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( L√©on the lion... Regent and Regina... Interesting name choices... )

CHOICE.Maya: L√©on... He died?

CHOICE.Regina: Yes. Actually he was killed. My dad killed him.

CHOICE.Phoenix: What!?

CHOICE.Maya: Why did he do that?

CHOICE.Regina: I'm not sure why he did it.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( It's tough not to get charmed when she looks at you with those innocent eyes... )

CHOICE.Maya: Regina... What's the matter? What's on your mind?

CHOICE.Regina: * giggle * I'll tell you Maya... But just you.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Ah!

CHOICE.Regina: Umm... Well... * mumble * * mumble *

CHOICE.Maya: What!? REALLY!?!?

CHOICE.Regina: And then... * mumble * * mumble *

CHOICE.Maya: Oh my! That's incredible Regina!!
C'mon Nick. There's no reason to pout!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Don't worry about me...

CHOICE.Maya: Regina told me that someone professed their love to her!

CHOICE.Phoenix: P-P-P-Professed their love!?

CHOICE.Maya: Not only that! It was Maximillion Galactica!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I wonder how many people have stolen one of his hearts anyways...? )

CHOICE.Maya: And then, on the exact same day, another person professed their love for her as well!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: What? Who was it!?

CHOICE.Maya: Someone named Trilo .

CHOICE.Phoenix: Trilo...?

CHOICE.Maya: Apparently he is a tenor who sings in the circus.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Hmm... Haven't met him yet. )

CHOICE.Maya: Regina seems to be quite the hit with the men in the circus!

CHOICE.Phoenix: She must have some sort of strange power over them!

CHOICE.Maya: You're not kidding. Two people in one day! Even I want to profess my love for her!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Me too! She's so cute... )

CHOICE.Regina: * giggle *
This silk hat is Max's.

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's right.

CHOICE.Regina: It's beautiful isn't it? I thought up the idea for wearing the hat.

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? Really?

CHOICE.Regina: Yep. He took my sketch to the hat shop... And they made a custom hat for him based off the sketch. There is only one of these silk hats in the entire world! Isn't that cool?
Maya... You're a spirit channeler?

CHOICE.Maya: Yep! I'm still training though.

CHOICE.Regina: That sounds like fun! I think you should join us at the circus!

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? As a spirit channeler?

CHOICE.Regina: Yeah! You'd be a big hit!

CHOICE.Maya: Really!? She says I'd be a big hit!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I think she's just being nice. )

CHOICE.Regina: It's Max!! Hey... Where is Max now anyways?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Y-You don't know?

CHOICE.Regina: Nope.

CHOICE.Phoenix: He's been arrested. He was charged with the murder of your father.

CHOICE.Maya: It's OK! Nick and I will help him!

CHOICE.Regina: Max isn't the guy, is he? I mean... The criminal?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Of course he's not!

CHOICE.Regina: I'm worried about so many things right now...

CHOICE.Maya: Hmm... Like what?

CHOICE.Regina: * giggle *
Cool! This lady's got a whip! She's an animal tamer, huh?

CHOICE.Maya: Hmm... Sort of...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Two women with whips... That's my cue to shut up and act like a good boy... )

CHOICE.Regina: Alright! I look so cute in this picture! Don't you think I look cute? Don't ya? Don't ya?

CHOICE.Maya: You sure do!

CHOICE.Phoenix: No objections here!

CHOICE.Regina: After practice was over, Dad went right back to his room.

CHOICE.Maya: His room?

CHOICE.Regina: Yes. That door right over there leads to the Ringmaster's room.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Hmm...

CHOICE.Regina: I dunno why, but he went off to his room in a hurry. I wonder what happened?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( The Ringmaster's room... It's probably a good idea to check it out for myself. )
What about this? What can you tell me?

CHOICE.Regina: Umm... I'm not really good at figuring out hard things.

CHOICE.Maya: Really? You too? I understand exactly what you mean...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I never expected Maya to make a new friend in a strange place like this... )
What do you think about this person?

CHOICE.Regina: Sorry...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Sorry?

CHOICE.Regina: I've already given my heart to another man. So I'm not interested in enrolling in your dating service.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Huh? I just wanted to know if you knew this person.

CHOICE.Max: Ahh! This is my silk hat! It's the only one of its kind in the world. It's one of my most prized possessions. This silk hat proves that I was somewhere else... Where did they find this? Huh, sweetie?

CHOICE.Phoenix: They found it at the murder scene.

CHOICE.Max: AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! I... I... I don't know nothing about nothing!

CHOICE.Maya: Eww... Max is so pathetic like this...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Max must be really confused... )

CHOICE.Max: That's... That's the Ringmaster. ... It's a shame what happened... He was going to be like a father to me...
Ahhh... My sweetie pie. She must be really lonely with me all cooped up in here.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Actually, she was laughing and rolling around with her tiger... )

CHOICE.Max: She is my special someone. And I am her special someone.

CHOICE.Maya: Uh-huh... Very complex...

CHOICE.Phoenix: What about this person?

CHOICE.Max: Unfortunately I don't take on apprentices. I mean, just look at the face on this one... It's not what I'd call fabulous.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( That's awfully harsh... )

text.ACTION: After clearing "Something unusual" and "The eyewitness" Talk options in Lodging House - Plaza, and visiting Big Top:

text.Maya: ... Max isn't here.

text.Phoenix: He must be in questioning.

text.Maya: Aww... I wanted to see a magic trick.

text.Phoenix: He should be back in a little bit.

text.Maya: I guess so.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Smile, you're on candid camera.
This guard monitors the visitor's room. I wonder if he is bored? He doesn't even try to glance over this way...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I've gotten affidavits from most of the performers at this circus. They are certainly a strange bunch of characters.

CHOICE.Maya: You don't say?

CHOICE.Gumshoe: Well, not stranger than you I suppose.

CHOICE.Maya: ... That was cold...

CHOICE.Gumshoe: I-I'm sorry. I was just messing around.

CHOICE.Maya: This silk hat really does look like it can fly!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: It does have a feather on it. Maybe that's why you think it can take off.

CHOICE.Maya: You're right! Nick, I bet you could wear a hat like this! This is like one of those hats a famous detective would wear!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Yeah... I guess so...

CHOICE.Maya: But... With a head as big as yours, you'd probably bust a hole in the * it!
CHOICE._info: ([sic])

CHOICE.Phoenix: No matter what the crime, we always meet the same detective at the scene.

CHOICE.Maya: Sometimes it seems like he's the only detective on the force. That would make Gumshoe really elite, wouldn't it?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Something tells me that no matter how you look at it, he's anything but elite... )

CHOICE.Maya: You know, if she wasn't so mean, I think she and I would get along...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Yeah, but that's the problem... She is so mean. And that whip... That thing hurts. It really hurts.

CHOICE.Maya: It is kinda cool though. I wouldn't mind having a whip myself. I bet that cracking the whip on you once or twice would be just what the doctor ordered!

CHOICE.Phoenix: W-Why me!? W-What did I do!?

CHOICE.Maya: Regina is sooo cute!

CHOICE.Phoenix: I have to admit that her smile does have a sort of hypnotic power.

CHOICE.Maya: Can you believe that she's an animal tamer? That's sooo cool! I'd like to try animal taming someday. Nick! Nick! Lie down! Roll over!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Once this case is solved, I'll roll over for you as many times as you want!

CHOICE.Maya: YAY!!! Remember, you promised, Nick!
Everyone loved the Ringmaster...

CHOICE.Phoenix: So I'm told. Why would anyone want to kill such a beloved man of the big top?

CHOICE.Maya: Motive will surely be a point of contention tomorrow in court.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( You can count on that... )

text.ACTION: After presenting Russell Berry profile in Berry Big Circus - Big Top:

text.Maya: This was the Ringmaster's room?

text.Phoenix: Yes. This room belonged to the victim. Which means this must be where Max met the Ringmaster last night.

text.Maya: Now that you mention it, that is what he said.

text.Phoenix: I wonder what... Hmm... That's an interesting poster.
text._info: (Changed from [I wonder what... Hmm... That's an intresting [sic] poster.] in the original release)

text.Maya: Ah! It's a poster of Max! I want it! I want it! Nick! I want it!

text.Phoenix: I wanna get outta here...

CHOICE.Maya: Nick... Look at all the photos lined up on the wall...

CHOICE.Phoenix: It's like a guided tour of the circus' history.

CHOICE.Maya: This is so cool! It seems like there were so many happy memories. Maybe we should do this sort of thing at our office? We can put up pictures of all the clients who have been found not guilty.

CHOICE.Phoenix: And what if we had a client who was found guilty?
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [What about the clients who were found guilty?] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: Umm... We'll just pretend like they don't exist. How's that? ... Nick! Now you've got me thinking about losing cases! Why'd you do that!?
All of these frames look the same.

CHOICE.Phoenix: They almost look like... Thank You cards. It looks like every year the Ringmaster made donations to charity... To the Robot Clown Research Center...

CHOICE.Maya: ... You're kidding right?

CHOICE.Phoenix: What!? They may be a perfectly reputable charity in the field of advanced tomfoolery!

CHOICE.Maya: Nick! Look at all the cute trophies!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Indeed. Just look at all the awards this circus has won...

CHOICE.Maya: Like... "All County Quiz Champions"... "Ringmaster's Association Mini Golf Master"... "Beer Belly Balloon Bounce Champ"... "Pet Grooming Grand Prix"... Wow. The Ringmaster was multi-talented in ways I could have never imagined...
There's a lot of posters here don't you think?

CHOICE.Phoenix: There are indeed.

CHOICE.Maya: So many posters that they aren't likely to miss one, are they?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Maya... We're supposed to be the honest ones around here.

CHOICE.Maya: But... But... You didn't even notice that I took one!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Arghhh... She already swiped one! )

CHOICE.Maya: Heh! Heh!

CHOICE.Phoenix: You're incorrigible, you know that?
Look at all the stars on this poster... This must have been the poster they used to promote their public appearances.

CHOICE.Maya: Posters are the way to go aren't they?

CHOICE.Phoenix: What do you mean?

CHOICE.Maya: We should make posters to promote our law firm. "Spine tingling legal action! Mind numbing legalese! You will say 'wow'!" Or perhaps, "Hold it! Don't miss out on a stunning life or death courtroom thrill ride!"

CHOICE.Phoenix: With those taglines, our law firm would sink faster than the Titanic...

CHOICE.Maya: You may not know this, but they call this a "tailcoat".

CHOICE.Phoenix: And they call this "the face of someone who already knew that..." Hmm...

CHOICE.Maya: What?

CHOICE.Phoenix: A scrap of white paper is sticking out of the coat pocket.

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? Where? Where?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Calm down, Maya. You can't just go rummaging through people's coats!

CHOICE.Maya: Ahhh... You always make me feel like I'm doing something wrong...
This is where the Ringmaster applied his makeup.

CHOICE.Phoenix: It's quite a collection of the most understated colors. Shocking Pink for example.

CHOICE.Maya: This one says it is "100% All Natural Organic Mascara."

CHOICE.Phoenix: And this one says "Sensitive enough for a baby, strong enough for a mime."

CHOICE.Maya: The Ringmaster must have been really concerned about skin care... Very metrosexual.
This is strange... Everything else looks nice, but this desk looks old and cheap.

CHOICE.Phoenix: There's a really big photo on the desk... It's a picture of Regina and her father, the Ringmaster.

CHOICE.Maya: He really loved her didn't he? Regina was lucky to have such a wonderful father.

CHOICE.Phoenix: It's a table for guests... There are some papers scattered on top.

CHOICE.Maya: Ah! Look at this! Max's salary is written on this piece of paper. YIKES!

CHOICE.Phoenix: W-What is it?

CHOICE.Maya: I didn't know that a magician... This salary is incredible!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( She looks like she's about ready to pass out from shock... ) How much is it!? How much is it!? T-T-THAT MUCH!?

CHOICE.Maya: Incredible, huh?

CHOICE.Phoenix: You can say that again. ( This must be the paper they used to negotiate Max's salary... The Ringmaster signed and dated it... )

CHOICE.Maya: What's the matter, Nick?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Max definitely got a raise... But this document is dated a week ago !
This was the table he used when visitors came to see him.

CHOICE.Maya: Eww... There's mud caked on the table.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Someone with terrible manners must have put their shoes up on the table!

CHOICE.Maya: Nick! Don't even think about it!

CHOICE.Phoenix: I wasn't! How uncouth do you think I am anyway?

text.ACTION: After clearing "The eyewitness" Talk option in Lodging House - Plaza and clearing ""What's on your mind?"" Talk option in Berry Big Circus - Big Top:
December 28 Berry Big Circus Circus Entrance

text.Maya: Huh? Hey Nick! Look over there!

text.Phoenix: What?

text.Maya: There's someone over there! Ex-Excuse me!

text.Phoenix: Hello.

text.Maya: Wow! He sure is a quiet one! Excuse me!!

text.???: Wha... Ha... Huh? M-Me?

text.Phoenix: Yes. You work at the circus don't you?

text.???: N-No. I'm just your everyday average Joe.

text.Maya: An average Joe who just happens to hang out at the circus? I don't think so.

text.???: Y-Yes I am. I've got nothing to do with what's going on here.

text.Phoenix: ( He's lying. Like any regular person would hang around the circus... Dressed like that! ) I'm an attorney. My name is Phoenix Wright.

text.Maya: I'm a spirit medium. My name is Maya.

text.???: Well... I... Um... Just happened to be... Umm... Passing by...

text.Phoenix: I don't suppose you happen to be some kind of carny?

text.???: Not a c-c-carny... I-I'm a p-performer. Actually, I'm a v-v-v-ventriloquist.

text.Maya: Ventriloquist?

text.???: He-he-he-he-he-he-he... I-I-I'm Benjamin Wo-Wo-Wo-Woodman...

text.Maya: Your last name is Woodman? * snicker *
text._info: (Changed from [You're [sic] last name is Woodman? *snicker*] in the original release)

text.???: Y-Yes... T-T-That's right... But e-everyone c-c-calls me B-B-B-B-B-Ben.

text.Maya: Ah... Yes yes yes... That's your alias, right?

text.Phoenix: I believe they call it a stage name.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Excuse me, Ben?

CHOICE.Ben: Uh... Yes? You mean... Me?

CHOICE.Phoenix: About the murder. I'd like to talk to you about the details, if I may.

CHOICE.Ben: R-Really... I'm just a regular normal guy... I don't k-k-now... A-a-a-a...

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( This guy's so nervous, he's creeping me out. )

CHOICE.Maya: Nick. Cheer up! Just try and smile!
Would you mind telling us something about Max? Maximillion Galactica.

CHOICE.Ben: Ma-Ma-Ma-Max? H-H-H-He's... N-N-N-Not... V-Very... N-N-Nice.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Did he just say that Max is "Not Very Nice"? )

CHOICE.Ben: O... O... O... Oww... My... H-H-Head... Hurts.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Yikes. I hope he is OK. It sounds like he just popped a gasket... )

CHOICE.Maya: Ben, so you're a ventriloquist?

CHOICE.Ben: I-I-I-I'm... J-J-J-Just A-A... R-R-R-Regular... G-G-Guy...

CHOICE.Phoenix: You already told us that you were a ventriloquist!!

CHOICE.Ben: Oh... Y-Y-Yes...

CHOICE.Maya: Nick! Don't yell at him! You can't do that!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: I can't help it! He's making me nervous!!

CHOICE.Maya: Ben, do you mind showing me some of your skills as a ventriloquist?

CHOICE.Ben: W-W-Well... I-I-I... R-R-R-Right... N-N-Now... M-M-My... P-P-P...

CHOICE.Phoenix: A-A-A-A-Ah... I-I-I-I-I W-W-W-W-Why... ( Urk!! He's contagious!! )

CHOICE.Maya: Would you mind taking a look at this?

CHOICE.Ben: Um... Umm... Uh... I-I-I-I...

CHOICE.Maya: ... I guess we won't need you to look at this after all.

CHOICE.Regina: Ahh, that guy. His name is Ben, right?

CHOICE.Maya: Huh? You don't know him?

CHOICE.Regina: I dunno... He didn't really catch my eye. He's friends with Trilo right?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Wait... We're the ones asking the questions around here... )

CHOICE.Maya: Hmm...

CHOICE.Phoenix: What's the matter, Maya?

CHOICE.Maya: Which poster is cooler? This one or the Steel Samurai poster?

CHOICE.Phoenix: I'm not a big fan of either one of them.

CHOICE.Maya: I guess putting a poster of a magician in a law office is kinda strange.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( No stranger than a poster of a hunk of junk carrying around a spear! )

CHOICE.Maya: Looking at this really makes you think.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Like what?

CHOICE.Maya: No matter how great a medium I become, there is no way I could make this kind of money.

CHOICE.Phoenix: So it's money you're after?

CHOICE.Maya: You only live once, right? Well, then you might as well live it fabulously!
Being a ventriloquist sounds like an interesting job.

CHOICE.Phoenix: I bet it's fun once you get good at it.

CHOICE.Maya: Maybe I should give it a try then! Here I go! "Hello e-e-everyone... I-I-I'm Phoenix Wright." "No matter what the lie or who the liar, I'll expose them for what they are!" What's the verdict?

CHOICE.Phoenix: You might want to practice not moving your lips so much.

CHOICE.Maya: Y-Yeah... Maybe I should sign up for some expert training.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Don't you have another type of training to attend to, young lady...? )

text.ACTION: After clearing "Something unusual" and "The eyewitness" Talk option in Lodging House - Plaza and clearing ""What's on your mind?"" Talk option in Berry Big Circus - Big Top, then visiting Berry Big Circus - Circus Entrance:
December 28 Lodging Hall 1st Floor Moe's Room

text.Maya: Hello...?

text.???: KABLAMMO! CONGRATULATIONS! YOU'RE THE BIG WEINER! The one millionth visitor to the room of one Mr. Moe Curls, AKA ME!!

text.Phoenix: ( Earplugs... Must... Find... Earplugs... )

text.Moe: To celebrate this momentous occasion, would you care for an organic grape? Just one! Did you get my joke right there!? Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!
I welched on giving you more than one!!

text.Phoenix: Umm...

text.Moe: No no no! If it was funny, it is your duty as a human being to laugh!! People who don't laugh are usually last-seen in Lan-sing. Catch my drift? Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

text.Phoenix: Umm... Maya?

text.Maya: Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

text.Phoenix: ( This is like some Faustian nightmare... )

text.Maya: C'mon! It was funny! Clowns are always funny in my book!

text.Phoenix: In my book, they're just funny lookin'.

text.Moe: You sure do have a great taste in clothes girlie! Look at that garb! You look just like Gretta Garb... OH! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

text.Phoenix: * sigh * I'm goin' home...

text.Maya: No! Nick! You can't!!

text.Phoenix: You know, I can excuse a bad joke or two... But this stooge keeps laughing at his own jokes! That's what I object to!

text.Maya: OK OK... I get it. But you have to admit he is kinda funny...

text.Phoenix: ( Argghhh... No, I do not have to admit that, because he isn't! )

text.Moe: Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

CHOICE.Moe: I look awfully snazzy in these costumes.

CHOICE.Maya: Umm... Did you just use the word "snazzy" in a sentence?

CHOICE.Moe: I sure did. These are haute couture from the best international clown designers. At least, that's what they said on the TV shopping channel I use... I like having a big collection so I can match my costume to my mood... And my carrot.

CHOICE.Maya: Hehe...

CHOICE.Moe: You know, I only own one T-shirt. The rest are all clown costumes!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Snazzy dresser!? More like spazzy dresser if you ask me! )

CHOICE.Maya: There's a hole in the ceiling... Why is there a hole in the ceiling?

CHOICE.Moe: Well... Umm... I was riding a pogo stick, and I guess I just overdid it a little...

CHOICE.Maya: "Overdid it a little"...?

CHOICE.Moe: What can I say, sometimes things get a bit crazy in one's college days...

CHOICE.Maya: Huh?

CHOICE.Moe: Carrots are one of my trademark props.

CHOICE.Maya: Yep! I saw you use them! You must believe in a carrot and no stick approach. You put the carrot out in front for motivation, but I guess the trick is gauging what flavor you want each day...

CHOICE.Moe: Exactly! You were really paying attention, weren't you!? You know, I eat about 5 of those carrots every single day. If you eat that many, you've gotta change up the taste every now and again.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I didn't understand any of that, nor do I ever want to. )
Moe, you've got quite the collection of pajamas... They really scream out to you.

CHOICE.Moe: You think they're loud, huh? I kinda thought they were refined... You know, a bit too adult for me to use on stage... That's why I used them as pajamas.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Wait a second... He sleeps in clown costumes!? )

CHOICE.Moe: Take a look at my desk. Aren't I the most studious clown you've ever seen? Every free moment I have, I spend it studying or reading.

CHOICE.Phoenix: The classic "Pull My Finger" or "Clown Car Maintenance and Repair".. Not to mention the bestseller "Jean-Luc de Laduc's Guide To Obnoxious French Pierrots"...

CHOICE.Maya: Umm... They all seem to cover rather basic topics though...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Maybe he is just trying to cover all of his bases?

CHOICE.Moe: Exactly! I want to be a renaissance clown!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Too bad he didn't buy "How To Be A Funny Clown"... )

CHOICE.Moe: Us clowns really take our work seriously. I try to hone my craft day and night, with the latest in jester technology. Unicycles. Trampolines. Balancing Balls. Accordions.

CHOICE.Phoenix: It looks like you've put quite a bit of wear and tear on that equipment...

CHOICE.Moe: Well... The theme of my act as a clown is... "How many ways can a fat funny guy fall down?" I don't care what I break or how I break it, as long as it ends with me on my bum!! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

CHOICE.Maya: What's this? A banana peel? * slips *

CHOICE.Moe: Oh my! Oh my! What a wonderful fall girlie! You should remember that when you see a banana peel, get ready to fall down! That is one of the basic tenants of clownsmanship.

CHOICE.Maya: Ow ow ow ow ow...

CHOICE.Moe: Every night, I fall down 100 times to practice the proper banana peel breakfall. WHOA! * slip * WHOA! * slip * WHOA! * slip *

CHOICE.Maya: Wow. He really is a pro, huh Nick!? His falls are totally different than my slip!
Could you please tell us more about the Berry Big Circus?

CHOICE.Moe: It's a Berry Big story... You sure you got that kind of time?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( And the hits just keep on comin'... * sigh * )

CHOICE.Moe: This circus has been in business for 20 years. We all performed under the guidance of the Ringmaster, Russell Berry.

CHOICE.Maya: Twenty years!? Wow!

CHOICE.Moe: Working in the circus is never easy, especially nowadays... With movies, TV, and bowling, there is just too much competition.

CHOICE.Maya: But... But... I LOVE THE CIRCUS!

CHOICE.Moe: I love it too... That is why I've been here for 20 years. We work hard to keep the show running. No one sends in the clowns on us!

CHOICE.Maya: Nick! He just made a joke! Laugh!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Har! Har! Har! Har! Har! Har!

CHOICE.Moe: The Ringmaster was a real big shot in the circus world. A real class act. Even when there were no customers, Russell would use his own money to pay me. Because he knew that I had a family to care for... He was happy to take care of his employees.

CHOICE.Maya: I see...

CHOICE.Moe: How could anyone do that to such a wonderful man...!?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Moe...

CHOICE.Moe: Wiggidty-wiggidty-wiggidty WHAT?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Ugh...

CHOICE.Maya: I'm sorry Moe. Nick was born without a sense of humor.

CHOICE.Moe: Don't worry about it... How can you fault someone for being born that way?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Let's talk about the murder.

CHOICE.Moe: Ahh... Let's see... It must've taken place around 10 PM last night. After rehearsals were finished, I was tuckered out, so I came back here. After I went to bed... That's when I caught a peek of it...

CHOICE.Maya: "Caught a peek...?"

CHOICE.Moe: Of the crime.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Just as we suspected... This guy's the eyewitness to the crime! ( Changed from [Moe was the eyewitness to the crime!] in the original release ) )
CHOICE._info: (Changed from [So this is what Detective Gumshoe was talking about...] in the original release)

CHOICE.Moe: The Ringmaster was truly ahead of his time. He would always add new elements to the show.

CHOICE.Maya: New elements...?

CHOICE.Moe: When you've been a performer for a long time, your act starts getting a bit stale.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Hmm...

CHOICE.Moe: I realize that even my act can get a bit long in the tooth... Sometimes my jokes can be a bit... Umm... Old-fashion.

CHOICE.Phoenix: "A bit long in the tooth?"

CHOICE.Moe: But that make-believer takes things too far!!

CHOICE.Maya: Make-believer?

CHOICE.Moe: The magician!! The one that thinks he's all high and mighty!! He had the gall to say to me, "You're one of those funny types, right?" What does he mean "one of those"!? Well the joke's on him now...

CHOICE.Phoenix: On him...?

CHOICE.Moe: Yep! He got on everyone's nerves!! The day of the murder... ...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Go ahead.

CHOICE.Moe: Nope. No way! Just forget I said anything!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( I bet he's still hiding something about Max... )
You say you saw the crime. Do you mind telling me what you saw?

CHOICE.Moe: Well, the police told me that I can't share my story with others. "Don't say a word, pal!!" I'm just gonna have to let these lips stay zipped!
CHOICE._info: (Changed from ['Don't say a word!!' I'm just gonna have to let these lips stay zipped!] in the original release)

CHOICE.Maya: That's not fair!

CHOICE.Moe: I guess you're right... Maybe I can tell you a few details. But only if you can get old stiff lips here to make with the funny...!

CHOICE.Phoenix: Stiff lips? Wait... Do you mean me?

CHOICE.Maya: Nick! You can do it!!

CHOICE.Phoenix: * achem * * achem *

CHOICE.Moe: What's the matter?

CHOICE.Phoenix: Just getting ready. OK... Do you know why I, Phoenix Wright, am a great lawyer? Because I'm Wright all the time!!

CHOICE.Maya: At least his expectations are low.

CHOICE.Moe: I wouldn't let him quit his day job.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Yeesh, cut a guy some slack. At least it was funnier than Chuckles over here. )

CHOICE.Moe: It wasn't the greatest joke I've heard, but you did try, so I'll tell you what I saw.

CHOICE.Maya: I'm sorry he's incapable of being funny, Moe.

CHOICE.Moe: That night... Once I had tucked myself into bed, I heard this amazing noise. It was incredibly loud. It sounded like a giant "THUMP"! Once I heard it, I jumped out of bed. That's when I saw... Without question. Without a doubt. It was that magician!! That's all I saw... But it just proves how terrible that man actually is!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( He knows more about Max than he is letting on... )

CHOICE.Moe: RUSSELL!! How could anyone do this to you... I... I... * sobs *

CHOICE.Maya: Moe's taking this really hard...

CHOICE.Moe: It's that uppity faker's uppity top hat! They found this at the scene of the crime, didn't they?

CHOICE.Phoenix: That's what I've been told...

CHOICE.Moe: Unbelievable. That jerk killed the Ringmaster!

CHOICE.Maya: It really is a shame what happened to the Ringmaster, huh Moe?

CHOICE.Phoenix: It seems that the Ringmaster was truly a great man...

CHOICE.Moe: Hmph! If he thinks he can kill the Ringmaster, it's only just that he should die, too!

CHOICE.Maya: Moe!!

CHOICE.Moe: Sorry. I crossed the line. But he truly is a disgusting human being.

CHOICE.Maya: Why do you hate him so much?

CHOICE.Moe: Let me tell you this one story... The morning before the murder, something terrible happened. Max clonked Ben right over the head, as hard as he could.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Ben? ( The ventriloquist with the speech impediment? )

CHOICE.Moe: You should go to the cafeteria and investigate for yourselves.

CHOICE.Maya: The cafeteria?

CHOICE.Moe: Let's just say there's Gotti be something interesting there... Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Ahh yes... The Berry Big Circus is very big, isn't it? You should always carry a map with you to get around...

CHOICE.Maya: Ah! Thank you!! Umm... This is an atlas!!

CHOICE.Moe: Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Oh... I kill myself. Really. I'm dying here... CORONARY! CORONARY!

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Now he's just laughing to hear his own voice... )

CHOICE.Moe: Hmph! If he thinks he can kill the Ringmaster, it's only just that he should die, too!

CHOICE.Maya: Moe!!

CHOICE.Moe: Sorry. I crossed the line. But he truly is a disgusting human being.

CHOICE.Maya: Why do you hate him so much?

CHOICE.Moe: Let me tell you this one story... The morning before the murder, something terrible happened. Max clonked Ben right over the head, as hard as he could.

CHOICE.Phoenix: Ben? ( The ventriloquist with the speech impediment? )

CHOICE.Moe: You should go to the cafeteria and investigate for yourselves.

CHOICE.Maya: The cafeteria?

CHOICE.Moe: Let's just say there's Gotti be something interesting there... Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha!

That's the Ringmaster's daughter, Regina. Ever since she was a little girl, she's been watching the circus performances. Cuter than a little puppy Maltese, that Regina. If only my Larina was that cute...

CHOICE.Maya: Larina?

CHOICE.Moe: Ah... Larina is my daughter. She lives with her mother now.

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( It's true what they say about the tears of a clown... )

CHOICE.Moe: I've been friends with Russell since even before the circus began. He was so selfless. He always thought about others before thinking of himself. I'll find a way to return the favor... He always took such good care of me. I wish I would have thanked him more than I did...
Ah, Ben... How's he doing?

CHOICE.Phoenix: He's a ventriloquist isn't he?

CHOICE.Moe: That's right! Boy was I surprised when they told me his secret! He's got a second mouth where his belly button should be!! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Aha! Just kidding...

CHOICE.Phoenix: Ben wouldn't tell me a single thing about the murder.

CHOICE.Moe: Ahh... That's a simple problem to solve. He won't talk if he doesn't have his puppet Trilo !

CHOICE.Maya: Trilo...?

CHOICE.Moe: If Ben doesn't have his ventriloquist's puppet, you'll barely get a word outta him.

CHOICE.Maya: Really?

CHOICE.Phoenix: ( Hmm... Master and puppet... )

CHOICE.Moe: Ah!

CHOICE.Maya: What's the matter?

CHOICE.Moe: Whenever I see my own pose, I am reminded of my Italian heritage...

CHOICE.Maya: Ahhhh... I see... It must be because you have one of those "Roman Noses"... Roamin' all over your face.

text.Maya: Max... Really... No one needs to fly today. ... Nick? What's with that look in your eyes?

text.Phoenix: ( I like the sound of that... "Dashing young lawyer flying fabulously..." )

text.ACTION: December 29, 10:00 AM District Court Courtroom No. 2

text.Judge: And now the case of one... ............

text.Franziska: Your Honor! Get on with it!

text.Judge: Oh... Sorry... I just realized that the defendant's name is Billy Bob Johns.

text.Phoenix: So...

text.Judge: Well, isn't the defendant also known as Maximillion Galactica?

text.Phoenix: Yes, Your Honor, he does often go by that name.

text.Judge: You know, my grandchild is a huge fan of his. I think everyone here wouldn't mind if we call the defendant Maximillion Galactica... It sounds more... Friendly.

text.Phoenix: ( Hmm... I wonder if that is to our advantage? )

text.Judge: Ms. von Karma. Your opening statement if you please.

text.Franziska: ...I hope you didn't bother thinking you'd win this one Mr. Phoenix Wright.

text.Phoenix: Eh?

text.Franziska: That spirit channeling trial was a sham! I refuse to acknowledge its legitimacy! It did not count! Do you hear me!?

text.Phoenix: ( She must still be upset about what happened last time... )

text.Franziska: You have no chance. Zero. Zilch. Nada. I'm not losing this case! Why, you ask? Because it is not in the nature of a Von Karma to lose at anything!!

text.Maya: I guess being born with the name Von Karma is a free pass to be arrogant and annoying.

text.Franziska: Watch and learn, Mr. Phoenix Wright! I'll show you the textbook procedure for proving how absolutely guilty you are!!

text.Phoenix: M-M-M-Me!? ... Guilty!? What are you talking about!?

text.Franziska: ...It will be my ultimate revenge...

text.Maya: But it's not like it'll bring her dad back...
text._info: (Changed from [Her dad is gone you know...] in the original release)

text.Franziska: There. Opening statement complete. Now, let's hurry and wrap up this waste of time.
text._info: (Chagned from [The prosecution is finished. Let's hurry and wrap up this waste of time.] in the original release)

text.Judge: Very well. You may call your first witness Ms. von Karma.
text._info: (Changed from [You may call your first witness Ms. von Karma.] in the original release)

text.Franziska: Detective Dick Gumshoe! Get up there! NOW!!
Sorry to keep you from work, as I'm sure you need every penny you can earn, Detective.

text.Gumshoe: Don't mention it! It's no trouble at all! I've been looking forward to this.

text.Franziska: Very well. I would like you to begin by shedding light on the events in question.

text.Gumshoe: At your service, sir.

text.Judge: Alright, Detective. You may proceed with your testimony.

text.Gumshoe:
The night of the crime, snow was falling until 9:40 PM, making it extremely cold out. 
All of the circus performers gathered in the Big Top to practice their routines. 
The practice session broke up around 10 PM . 
The murder itself took place in the plaza in front of the lodging house at 10:15 PM . 
The victim was found bent over a wooden box dead as a doornail. 
The cause of death was blunt force trauma that snapped a vertebrae in his neck .

text.Judge: I see... He was beaten to death.

text.Gumshoe: Here is the autopsy report for the victim.

text.Judge: The court accept [sic] this into evidence.
A blunt object... Hmm... Very well... Mr. Wright, you may begin your cross-examination.

text.Phoenix: Yes, Your Honor.
